short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds ability to open job postings from NUworks in a new tab.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This allows users to open job postings in a new tab and improve your quality of life when comparing jobs or just applying to many at once. You can't normally open job postings in new tabs, so this extension allows you to do so.
